Check Leanpub Course

Source: R/check_course.R
check_course.Rd

Check Leanpub Course

check_course(
  course_dir = ".",
  save_metrics = TRUE,
  timezone = "America/New_York",
  require_authorization = TRUE,
  use_book = FALSE,
  check_youtube_links = TRUE,
  ...
)

Arguments

course_dir

directory with course materials
save_metrics

Should an `rds` file be saved of the `data.frame`?
timezone

Timezone to be used?
require_authorization

Should you authorize for Google Slides and such to check the modified time?
use_book

Use Book.txt to keep only the manuscript files that were specified.
check_youtube_links

Should YouTube links be checked? If starting a course, set to FALSE
...

arguments to pass to didactr_auth

Value

A list of data frames of the checked course. Will have class course_check

Examples

root_path = tempfile()
course_name = "test this out2"
book_txt =  system.file("extdata", "Book.txt", package = "didactr")
sc = create_course(course_name, root_path, book_txt = book_txt)

#> ✔ Setting active project to '/private/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T/RtmpUTiJRp/filedda89146f5f/test_this_out2'
#> Creating missing /private/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T/RtmpUTiJRp/filedda89146f5f/test_this_out2/scripts directory

#> Creating missing /private/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T/RtmpUTiJRp/filedda89146f5f/test_this_out2/manuscript/resources/videos directory

#> ✔ Writing 'test_this_out2.Rproj'
#> ✔ Adding '.Rproj.user' to '.gitignore'
#> ✔ Adding 'manuscript/resources/videos' to '.gitignore'
#> ✔ Setting active project to '<no active project>'
course_dir = sc$course_dir
in_ci <- function() {
nzchar(Sys.getenv("CI"))
}
if (!in_ci()) {
object = check_course(sc$course_dir, require_authorization = FALSE)
}

#> Google Slides ID is missing from following lessons: 00_types, 01_reports, 02_presentations, 03_general, 04_technical, 05_blogpost, 06_meetings, 07_one_on_one, 08_notebook, 09_graphs
